name: IBM-Business Intelligence
desc: Credential issued by IBM Career Education Program via Cognitive Class, backed by the IBM Developer Skills Network

name: DevOps Fundamentals
desc: Gained practical knowledge of DevOps tools and practices like CI/CD, automation, and agile development through IBM's Cognitive Class platform. Focused on improving software delivery and collaboration.

name: Introduction to MOngoDB
desc: Learned the fundamentals of MongoDB, including NoSQL concepts, data modeling, and CRUD operations. Focused on practical skills for working with MongoDB databases in real-world applications.

name: Power-BI Workshop
desc: Gained hands-on experience in creating AI-powered interactive dashboards using Power BI. Trained to build efficient data visualizations in under 30 minutes.

name: EF SET
desc: Achieved a C2 Proficient level (71/100) on the EF SET English Certificate, demonstrating advanced skills in reading, listening, writing, and speaking English.

name: Microsoft-Cloud native apps and containerized deployments
desc: Cloud-native applications using containerization technologies. Covered key concepts of modern app development and scalable cloud deployment strategies

name: Microsoft-Scale and manage deployed container apps
desc: Learned how to effectively scale and manage deployed containerized applications using modern cloud-native tools and practices. Gained hands-on experience in ensuring app performance and reliability at scale.

name: Microsoft
desc: Cloud-native applications using containerization technologies. Covered key concepts of modern app development and scalable cloud deployment strategies
